pr_title: HIVE-24570 Hive on spark tmp file should be delete when driver process finished

timeline.bodyText: Is sparkTmpProperties only assigned when cancel called? Is there any normal scenario the properties need to be deleted?
timeline.author: yongzhi

replies.bodyText: not only cancel, when spark driver stop include success finished and killed, both will be delete this applicationId tmp file
replies.author: fsilent

replies.bodyText:
Test result like this:


hive on spark task is running
Queue | Application Priority | StartTime | FinishTime | State | FinalStatus | Running Containers
-- | -- | -- | -- | -- | -- | --
Hive on Spark (sessionId =   5e75b839-0a66-45c6-bc98-4ea14befc267) | SPARK | default | 0 | Thu Jan 7 09:52:31 +0800 2021 | Thu Jan 7 N/A | RUNNING


spark tmp file in java.io.tmpdir(default is /tmp)
root@xxxx tmp]# ll spark*
-rw------- 1 xxx xxxx 37438 Jan  7 09:56 spark-submit.2308482618955056124.properties


beeline is finished


Hive on Spark (sessionId =   6228c803-55be-4c2a-9868-3deae7c432c3) | SPARK | default | 0 | Thu Jan 7 09:52:31 +0800 2021 | Thu Jan 7 09:54:04 +0800 2021 | FINISHED | SUCCEEDED


spark tmp file was deleted
[root@xxxx tmp]# ll spark*
ls: cannot access spark*: No such file or directory


if use kill -9 beeline pid, also can delete spark tmp file
replies.author: fsilent
